biolockj.util

Class RMetaUtil

  • java.lang.Object
    • biolockj.util.RMetaUtil

  • public final class RMetaUtil
extends Object
    This utility is used to validate the metadata to help ensure the format is valid R script input.

    • Method Detail

      • classifyReportableMetadata

        public static void classifyReportableMetadata(BioModule module)
                                       throws Exception
        Classify and verify the R filter and reportable metadata fields listed in the Config file.
        All metadata fields are reported unless specific fields are listed in: Config."r.reportFields". Each field is classified as binary, nominal, or numeric which determines the R statistical test used and the type of plot generated.
        • Fields with exactly 2 unique non-null values are classified as binary data unless specified in: Config."r.numericFields"
        • Fields with numeric data are classified as numeric data unless specified in: Config."r.nominalFields"
        • Fields with nominal or mixed nominal/numeric data are classified as nominal data.

        If Config."report.numReads" = "Y", add the last read count field in the metadata file as a numeric field store in {link biolockj.module.implicit.RegisterNumReads#getNumReadFieldName()}

        If Config."report.numHits" = "Y", add the ParserModuleImpl.getOtuCountField() field as a numeric field.

        Perform validations:

        • Verify reportable metadata fields exist and contain at least 2 unique values
        • Verify numeric fields contain all numeric data

        Save MASTER Config properties to store lists of binary, nominal, and numeric fields

        Parameters:
        module - BioModule
        Throws:
        Exception - if Config lists invalid metadata fields or metadata filed has less than 2 unique values

      • getBinaryFields

        public static Set<String> getBinaryFields(BioModule module)
                                   throws Exception
        Get the Config."R_internal.binaryFields" fields containing only 2 non-numeric values.
        Parameters:
        module - is the Calling BioModule
        Returns:
        Set of column names with only 2 non-numeric values
        Throws:
        Exception - if unable to assing binary fields

        Returns:
        Set of MDS fields

      • isMetaMergeModule

        public static boolean isMetaMergeModule(BioModule module)
                                 throws Exception
        Check module for metadata merged output in hte module output directory.
        Parameters:
        module - BioModule
        Returns:
        TRUE if module contains metaMerged.tsv files
        Throws:
        Exception - if errors occur

      • isMetaMergeTable

        public static boolean isMetaMergeTable(File file)
                                throws Exception
        Method analyzes the file name to determine if the file could be output from the BioModule AddMetadataToTaxaTables
        Parameters:
        file - Ambiguous file
        Returns:
        TRUE if named like a meta merged file
        Throws:
        Exception - if errors occur

      • reportAllFields

        public static boolean reportAllFields(BioModule module)
        The override property: Config."r.reportFields" can be used to list the metadata reportable fields for use in the R modules. If undefined, report all fields.
        Parameters:
        module - BioModule
        Returns:
        true if "r.reportFields" is empty

      • updateRConfig

        public static boolean updateRConfig(BioModule module)
                             throws Exception
        Get updated R config props
        Parameters:
        module - BioModule
        Returns:
        map of R props by data type
        Throws:
        Exception - if errors occur

      • verifyMetadataFieldsExist

        public static void verifyMetadataFieldsExist(BioModule module,
                                             String prop,
                                             Collection<String> fields)
                                      throws Exception
        This method verifies the fields given exist in the metadata file.
        Parameters:
        module - Source BioModule calling this utility
        prop - Config property name
        fields - Set of metadata fields
        Throws:
        Exception - if the metadata column does not exist
